title: What is the teachers strike really about?
description: Over the next couple of months, thousands of teachers are due to strike across the UK. What is the government doing in response to their demand for an above-inflation pay increase? Jessica Elgot reports. Help support our independent journalism at theguardian.com/infocus
episode: What is the teachers strike really about?
creator: The Guardian
